                      cache = TRUE,
                      cache.path = "cache/",
                      fig.path = "images/")

```{r anu}
rD <- rsDriver(browser="firefox", port=4779L, verbose=F)
remDr <- rD[["client"]]

baseurl<- "https://programsandcourses.anu.edu.au/"
wait_time <- function() Sys.sleep(sample(3:5, 1))

data <- tibble(Course = character(),
               Course_code = character(),
               Unit = character(),
               Unit_code = character(),
               Overview = character(),
               Prohibition = character(),
               Prerequisite = character(),
               Corequisite = character(),
               LearningOutcome = character())


remDr$navigate("https://programsandcourses.anu.edu.au/program/madan#program-requirements")
wait_time()
course_html <- read_html(remDr$getPageSource()[[1]])

title <- course_html %>% 
      html_element(".intro__degree-title__component") %>% 
      html_text()

# select cricos code for the time being
# code <- course_html %>% 
#       html_element("ul.degree-summary__codes-column:nth-child(1)") %>% 
#       html_element("li:nth-child(3)") %>% 
#       html_element("span:nth-child(2)") %>% 
#       html_text()

tryCatch({
  
    curriculum <- course_html %>% 
      html_element("#study") %>% 
      html_element("div:nth-child(1)") %>% 
      html_children() %>% 
      html_elements("a") %>% 
      html_attr("href") %>% 
      as.character()
    
    for(unit in curriculum) {
      cunit <- str_sub(unit ,start = -8)
      remDr$navigate(glue("{baseurl}{unit}"))
      wait_time()
      unit_html <- read_html(remDr$getPageSource()[[1]])
      
      subject_text <- unit_html %>%
        html_element(".intro__degree-title__component") %>% html_text()
     
      #message(paste("Going through the unit:", subject_text))
      
      ## get the overview of the unit
      overview <- unit_html %>% 
        html_element("#introduction ") %>% 
        html_element("p:nth-child(1)") %>% 
        html_text()
      
       ## Requisite and Incompatibility
      requisite <- unit_html %>% 
        html_element(".requisite") %>% 
        html_text()
      
        ##learning outcomes

      lc <- unit_html %>% 
        html_element("#overview") %>% 
        html_text()
      
      data <- data %>% 
        bind_rows(tibble(!!!list(Course = title, 
                                   Course_code = "MDS", 
                                   Unit = cunit[,2],
                                   Unit_code = cunit[,1],
                                   Overview = overview,
                              #     Assumed_knowledge = assumed,
                                   Prohibition = pro,
                                   Prerequisite = pre, 
                                   Corequisite = co,
                                   LearningOutcome =lc)))
      }
      
    data <- merge(data, 
                  curriculum,
                  by = "Unit_code")
    }, error = function(x) x)
  



```
